title: VA (Recruitment Experience) – apply manually 1,000 Job Applications Per Month
job_overview:
I’m looking for a corporate  background highly organized, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant with experience in recruiting or job application processing. Your main task will be to help  my client  apply to cybersecurity roles by submitting 1,000-2,000 Manual tailored applications per month and reaching out to hiring managers via LinkedIn on my clients behalf 

Must have experience with recruitment, job application processing, or candidate sourcing

Excellent written English

Able to tailor resumes and use judgment to match job keywords

Familiarity with LinkedIn, job boards, and company career portals

Strong attention to detail and ability to follow instructions

Experience with Google Sheets, excel Data entry 


 *Key Responsibilities
Source jobs from LinkedIn, Dice, company websites

Verify if the job post and company are legit (checklist provided)

Tailor resumes based on job description (template provided)

Apply through the correct platform (company website or LinkedIn)

Send outreach messages to hiring managers or recruiters on LinkedIn

Update a job application tracker (Google Sheets )

Submit a weekly summary of applications completed and responses received
